description: Alain`s Malamar was the final Pok√©mon to be revealed to face Leon in the Masters Eight Tournament first round. It swapped out with Alain`s Charizard and faced Leon`s Charizard. That match-up didn`t prove to be very good as Leon`s Charizard was too strong for Malamar and quickly defeated it requiring Alain to send out his Charizard again.
name: Calamanero (Alan)
